column1: The Pit Room////Secondly the brisket he gave me was a terrible slice. It had some of the burnt end which is fine but also included the heaviest
column2: fattest part of the brisket which included nothing but fat and gristle. I felt like the dude gave me the "unwanted" parts for some reason
column3: what cause I'm a short Asian guy with glasses I definitely know nothing about central Texas BBQ huh
column4: maybe I need to wear jeans and a red hat (maga?) to get the "good cuts"
